title: Southern Sea: Movie I Screenplay
description: SYNOPSYSAn epic story about the life of Cheng I, a notorious pirate harboring two contrasting identities. Forced by circumstances, Cheng I marries the renowned brothel owner Madam Xianggu. She demonstrates her exceptional skills and resourcefulness, improving Cheng's pirate confederation, but political intrigues and power struggles emerge among the other pirate clan leaders.LOGLINEIn the lawless South China Sea, pirate clans unite to battle rival factions and the Qing dynasty fleet.
author: Boris Pronsky
